website_summaries.verdict: An ample supply of pure grapeseed oil for natural body care, including hair, nails, and skin.
pros: Free of fragrance and chemicals, including hexane
Hand pump for easy access to the oil for beauty or massage purposes
Can act as a carrier oil
cons: At first glance, the price might seem higher than average, but buyers should note the large quantity offered

customer_reviews.title: Feela Light and Absorbs Quickly
customer_reviews.text: This oil does goes on exactly as the label describes. I was so surprised when I opened the packaged and it contained a pump and a cap for dispensing (yay!). I chose to use the pump for ease, and it has been lovely. I pump out what I need for daily applications after shower, the oil goes on smoothly, it feels light, and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t weigh down my skin, and I it moisturizes beautifully. I’m glad I found this! I also got the Castor Oil and have rave reviews about that for my feet and hair! BTW, no one paid me to say anything. Lol
customer_reviews.author: MzKiesha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisterizer for after shower.  I wish they would put this on auto delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and in good condition. I had no problems with the pump. Because this grapeseed oil has no scent this a great carrier oil for whatever perfume you use... after you shower squirt some oil in your hand then spray your scent into the oil and apply to your skin. No more need to spend money on scented lotions or bath oil. If you rub a bit the left over amount in your hair it will help with fly-a-ways and your hair will smell heavenly all day. PS. If you have oily skin and have had breakouts when you use coconut oil, try this oil instead. Grapeseed oil much less likely to cause breakouts than coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: feli

customer_reviews.title: Not good to keep my skin moisturized.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my all over face and body moisturizer.. What I noticed after a few uses - my skin feels very soft, but so much more very, very dry. It also has a “funky” smell, like old grease. So my closet now has that “yuky” smell and I just hate it. My bed linens, everything I wore while trying product has that fragrance from my body. I’m so disappointed. Trying to stay away from products containing parabens, but its difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I must order more. I really enjoyed it. My skin has been extra soft since using this. I also apply in my hair & I've noticed it has made my hair a lot thicker which I love because I use to have very thin hair. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title as far the ingredient oil. Its not!
customer_reviews.text: The title is misleading. It says100% pure grape seed oil. I was itching and reacting and couldn't figure out why . Then today I was rereading the information and saw it contains coconut oil and almond oil.. That showed me why I was having the itching and breaking out in sores. I am allergic to both!! They should be clear about their ingredients!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: not grapeseed oil!
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered grapeseed oil, the ingredients are 100% sweet almond oil. I'm allergic to almonds, so this is DEFINITELY not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: happydaze

customer_reviews.title: grapeseed or sweet almond?
customer_reviews.text: I like sweet almond oil and grapeseed oil the same so I'm not necessarily unhappy with my purchase. I'm just confused, and honestly put off by the packaging; it says grapeseed on the front and sweet almond on the back. I'm going to use it regardless of not knowing what it is because it seems quality and didnt irritate my skin (patch test -you never know) I honestly cant tell the diffence between oils most of the time so i rely on the company to give me the correct product. For that reason, I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I would call oil light to medium weight. I use it just out of the shower and it's perfect. No scent. And the manufacturer went the extra mile in including a screw on cap, a flip cap and a pump. This is the first time I have used grape seed oil as a body moisturizer and I like it. I alternate between Johnson's baby oil with aloe and Ahava dry oil spray as well as this product. I like them all. One thing that sets this apart is that I notice it gives a nice glow to my tan forearms but it's not greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: girlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the grape-seed and apricot oils and it only came with one pump, and reached out to customer service. Customer service was great and responded quickly! Sent me my missing supplies and a free bottle ASAP. Def will buy again! Great size and love the oils!
customer_reviews.author: Kharen

customer_reviews.title: 3 dispensing options
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to see it came with three options for dispensing. A twist cap, pump, and a push open/close cap. I used it to make breastmilk lotion and sometimes apply to my son hair. It's a very light scent will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy this oil
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of oil in the past with no issues, but this stuff - woah - horrifying garbage. It broke me out after using it for facial cupping so badly that I had to use TCA to lift the attempted scarring. Thankfully, I caught it before it did anything permanent. It is so bad, I would not recommend at all. In fact, I de-recommend this product. P.S. I bought this on the recommendation of a YouTuber and I have wondered whether the awfulness of this product was an intentional "gaslight" sort of thing. You know? Recommend a junk product like a Kardashian would.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ohara

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect labeling!
customer_reviews.text: There is really something wrong with the labeling on this product. On the front part of the product label it states 100% Grapeseed oil. On the back it says Ingredients: 100% Almond Oil. I returned the item hoping that I would receive a properly labeled product and have some assurance that what is inside is what I purchased. However, the labeling on the replacement is the same. This could really be a problem for someone who is allergic to almond oil, if this product indeed contains almond oil. It would behoove the manufacturer to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: Father Knows Best

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has done wonders for my hair. I lather it into my dry hair about twice a week 15-20 minutes before I shower. It has turned my very dry hair into soft ends and a healthy scalp. It doesn't smell like anything, which is fine with me and the bottle is huge for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for new parents!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to treat my daughters thrush and it worked amazing! I also apply to my skin in the morning and at night and have seen a better complexion. My dark circles from the lack of a sleep of having a new born are a lot lighter than before I used the product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A MustHave Pure Grape Seed Oil Pump
customer_reviews.text: Love this Grape seed Oil. I apply daily after my shower and on nights I enjoy a jacuzzi. The pump makes it easy to use, the scent is extremely mild so no interference when you apply your favorite fragrance. Keeps my skin hydrated and smooth. I prefer to put my favorite scented lotion on after I rub the oil in so I’m not greasy. Grape seed oil is an anti inflammatory and is great for your circulation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kutey-Landen

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Good in hair, and super dry skin. Doesn't absorb a whole lot if you overuse so be aware. Goes great in salt scrubs, leaves feet feeling great. Has mild scent but nothing too overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a cap and they give you pump seperately. You can use as per your convenience. And oil absorbs in your skin. And Its my second day using it it does nourishes your skin ,doesn't smell at all so you can use it after shower. I would say it's a perfect body oil if you are looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Contains no additives and is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have a little bottle of Grapeseed oil which I use to put on my hands under gloves while sleeping. It is soothing, calming, heads a wide range of healing benefits, and really a light scent which I do not mind. it is natural. Very good packaging, no leaks when I got it and it comes with a pump. I do not use the pump but saved the pump for maybe something else. I use my small bottle which I store in the bathroom on the vanity top. Better than the vitamin E oil which has all kinds of additives or other oils. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Whitethunder44

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE....
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product, I made sure that I ordered the grapeseed oil. When I got my order last week, the front label says 100% grapeseed oil, but the ingredients say 100% almond oil. It smells like almond oil. I contacted the seller, but have not heard back. I am going to return this, as it is not grapeseed oil. This product is not what it says it is. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great. I'm not experienced enough to know for sure if it is superior or anything.
customer_reviews.text: Scent is mild you guys. It is grapeseed afterall. It is a carrier oil. We bought this bottle Aug 2018, used for massage oil and very rarely hair oil. I think it's awesome, sinks into skin/scalp very well. Wipe off any oil as soon as it spills if it spills on the bottle or the spilled oil gets disgusting-sticky, all oils do that. Would buy again. Did not buy again when the bottle finished Dec 2019 because wanted to try jojoba oil for massage oil. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andriana DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grapeseed oil! It is doing wonders for my hair and nails. My nails are stronger and my hair is growing back. The packaging is great. There was a lovely note from the seller and multiple types of caps. The shipping was also very fast. I will continue to purchase from this seller and I look forward to trying more products from them.
customer_reviews.author: MKBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy on this size bottle of grapeseed oil. I love that it comes with a pump. This makes it so easy to use. I massage it into my face and hair. I like it much better than moisturizers or other oils. It came packaged very well with the pump attachment separately as well as with an additional top that snaps open and closed. I highly recommend this product - it is hexane free, chemical free and vegan.
customer_reviews.author: sarita h.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Does not soothe skin for better shave. Does not sooth beard irritation.
customer_reviews.author: California Man

customer_reviews.title: Buyer for Life
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 for smell since I didn't smell anytbing but not in a bad way. Overall, the oil made hair so soft. I used this to remove makeup as well. Before used olive oil but this was way more thinner and made my makeup glide right off for face wash. Will purchase this for life!
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Confidence booster
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just never been the type of woman to have the confidence to leave the house without makeup. This oil has reduced the need for me to wear foundation, so that is changing!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Remover
customer_reviews.text: I started using this as makeup remover and it is AMAZING. When you use the manufactured wipes, you never feel like you are getting it all off. The grape seed oil gets it ALL off and makes your skin feel healthy and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Westley W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, it doesn’t have a scent and I have used it as a moisturizer. But I have noticed I must be allergic or sensitive to this because I’m getting little red spots where I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: caroline tan

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisturizing locs/natural hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this moisturize my locs. It is perfect. Works very similar to jojoba oil but MUCH cheaper. Not too oily/greasy. Leaves my hair very soft. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Giggra

customer_reviews.title: ☺️
customer_reviews.text: I was told this oil help with hair growth. I haven’t seen a change yet but I love that it doesn’t have a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kymmee

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes your skin feel amazing. My plan is to add essential oils for fragrance because the smell... well.. it smells like oil, but feels great on the skin. That's why I'm giving it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin worse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a moisturizer and it ended up making my skin even more dry. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Grapeseed Oil is an amazing moisturizer for people that Jojoba Oil and Coconut Oil are too strong for. The other two make me break out, this doesn't. It's a game changer. I like the different caps they provide you with, I reuse this bottle even when I find a better deal on the oil itself.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon L. Tyson III

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to try to clear my acne since nothing else has worked. I've only used it a couple times now so not to sure yet if It will help but so far it definitely is making my skin softer. Not only greasy or dry itchy feeling. Like it's nice and soft. So hopefully it will help with the acne to. We will see but i definitely love how nice it feels. And there is no smell so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jo

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser was broken.
customer_reviews.text: Oil is great, but the dispenser came broken off. It would be nice not to have to pick the bottle up everytime. Cheap fix but still kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.author: rsw

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Grapeseed oil and the label was correct but when I looked at the ingredient list it said Sweet Almond Oil. This was my first time purchasing Grapeseed oil ,so I have no idea if this is actually Grapeseed oil or Sweet Almond oil. Such a bummer. The picture on amazon also makes the bottle seem thicker than it actually is. I love the pump that it came with though that's why I'm giving it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie☆Queen

customer_reviews.title: Scentless!
customer_reviews.text: Big bottle for what you spend. Rather scentless for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Using as a carrier oil for essential oils. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not too oily.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it after showering. I wore while working on the hot sun and did not burn.
customer_reviews.author: nking

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Perfect for the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Nails, hair, and skin just like the bottle describes. Nails became stronger. Not sure if that is science driven however it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar_Mike86

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for skincare
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this as an oil cleanser for my acne and it didn’t rinse off well. It felt heavy on the skin even after trying to wash it off with a cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. No complaints. It mixes well with lotion. Includes a pump and a squirt cap, which have worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian or Jodee

customer_reviews.title: Get this ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Extremely moisturizing, smells amazing, the price is affordable for the amount you get. I’ve been using it daily for a few weeks now and had no issues. My skin is super sensitive so that says a lot. I do not use it on my face just my body. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. DeShields

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for facial massage and hand/arm massage on my clients. Light oil with a pleasant scent. The pump top makes it very easy to dispense what I need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Label saying "Grapeseed Oil" but it is Almond Oil
customer_reviews.text: The first order we got was really nice so we order three more of these items. But this time we got Almond Oil. Main label saying it is "Grapeseed Oil" but in ingredients, it is saying "Almond Oil". We tested the Oil and it is indeed "Almond Oil". Even the replacement also, they sent "Almond Oil" again. I am returning all packages and need to find a better Grapeseed Oil.
customer_reviews.author: siri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! So silky, it has also helped with a scar I have had for years. It is almost gone!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Dover

customer_reviews.title: Wrong oil on the ingredients list or a lie?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased organic 100% Grapeseed Oil, but the Ingredients list reads: “100% Pure and Natural Sweet Almond Oil” Is this a labeling mistake or is this purposeful misrepresentation of a product? What is in this bottle??? Who knows!
customer_reviews.author: Cloe J

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am currently obsessed! Moisturizes hair and skin very well! My skin is left looking very healthy and smooth and my hair has lost most of it's frizz. This oil is very easy to absorb on the skin but be careful because a little can go a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this product. The scent isn’t strong either.
customer_reviews.text: Huge bottle and I don’t use a lot so it will last for a while. I use one squirt for my face and its really moisturizing without leaving my skin feeling oily or looking shiny. I also use it on my hair and it leaves it looking moisturized without looking or feeling oily or weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Kaja

customer_reviews.title: Great for low porosity hair; not as absorbent for my skin
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my hair, for which it worked great. My hair doesn't like heavy products, so this was perfect for it. Just a little, and I'm fine. I decided to try it on my skin as I ran out of my petroleum jelly. I'm not sure where the problem lies, but it doesn't absorb well into my skin, and my skin still feels dry when after using.
customer_reviews.author: saraheyoasuquo

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this for a natural moisturizer. I hate dead skin on my hands and feet and this helps in just one use! I have also used it as a hair mask and it's wonderful. It has really no scent but essential oils can be added for scent.
customer_reviews.author: RachLab18

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to layer with my lotion for my skin. There is very little smell and does go on smoothly. It is a little heavy so use sparingly. I use it in my hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Good oil for making natural treatments
customer_reviews.text: I mix this oil with cocoa butter, vitamin E, and rosehip oil to make my own natural body and face oil. It's really hydrating!
customer_reviews.author: Kym Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a pump and a pour spout. My favorite was that it even has a lock for the pump. Grape seed oil is great for the skin.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Label is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Love the oil, only gave it one star because front of bottle says 100% grape seed oil (which is why I purchased it) but ingredients listed 100 % pure ALMOND oil???!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my face and body daily and I love it. My complexion looks much brighter and my face feels hydrated. It does not leave your skin oily at all. Awesome stuff and I wish I knew about the benefits of it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used better and worse This one gets 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grape seed oil is ok. I’ve used better, I’ve used worse. I find it a bit more greasy than some other grape seed oils I have used in the past. I purchased this one because of the high ratings and because of the pump. The pump comes in handy, just don’t tap too hard or it shoots out.
customer_reviews.author: Terin

customer_reviews.title: Label Says it’s 2 Different Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. As you can see in my photos the front label says it’s grapeseed oil but the ingredients in the 2nd photo say it is sweet almond oil. Because it does not have a scent, I’m not sure what the actual ingredient is. It is very moisturizing and leaves your skin soft but I would like to know what it actually is. Seems like other people who have received this same product are having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the pump dispense & no scent: any scent can be added for a nice massage or leave it odor less and it's a great oil to use on skin, after showering
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Helped me with my dryness problem
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a natural lubricant as it helps with my dryness down there due to hormonal imbalances. No it does not irritate that area it's actually helped immensely.
customer_reviews.author: JHaynes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used it for playfulness with another as she suggested and it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Avila

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this purchase. Pleasant smell. Great moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.author: Charisma Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, well packed, best brand we’ve tried yet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Came very well packed. Came with a pump and and extra squeeze cap. Feels and smells so good. Very very happy. You can tell this company takes pride in what they do.
customer_reviews.author: James MellingerJR

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset. I thought this was grapeseed oil. But on the package under ingredients it said 100% sweet almond oil. So now I have no idea what's actually in the bottle. So I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: hair and body to kill for.
customer_reviews.text: I always thought oil on my hair would be greasy, but I get up in the morning and rinse my hair - it is so soft! And body to kill for.
customer_reviews.author: MHernandez

customer_reviews.title: pure grapeseed oil
customer_reviews.text: delivery was very fast and there was no damage to bottle in package. the price on the size bottle is very good compared to stores in my town. the oil has a nice feel to it also. this will make a nice carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: wsj

customer_reviews.title: New formula isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: The formula changed (along with the label) and this is no in longer moisturizing at all - it seems to make my skin dryer
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Come with Pump (as pictured)
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to use this quality of grapeseed oil for my hair and skin, as I’ve found it worked well for me in the past. I just wish it came with the pump that is pictured! That’s what part of what convinced to purchase this particular one and not the others. I’m thinking that’s also part of what I’m paying for? :/
customer_reviews.author: Damilola Idowu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Over this product..its very light weight yet moisturizing. My locs feel soft and not oily. There's really no scent to it. Overall it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It is moisturizing and not sticky. I use it on my skin and hair. I have bad sinuses so I love that there is no over bearing scent. I will definitely but this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lequice Cooper

customer_reviews.title: All around uses
customer_reviews.text: Can use it as a moisturizer or in your hair as a special treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Barron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I originally bought it to make my own hair serums and it was the first time ever using grape seed oil. I even noticed a difference in my hair after the first week of using it. The packaging is nice and and smell is alright, doesn’t have a strong smell which is nice and it’s not extremely greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality oil!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my aromatherapy roll-on carry everywhere perfumes! I like this it's a good carrier oil. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Nolin

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a carrier oil to use with my essential oils. Feels great and absorbs fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with my at-home cupping kit... works well and is good for your skin. I will say the product picture makes it look like a bigger/wider bottle than it actually is, but still overall happy with my purchase and would buy again. Just know it’s a tad smaller than it appears.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy j.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading labeling
customer_reviews.text: I bought grapeseed oil to use as a moisturizer for my face since I've never tried it before. The packaging says grapeseed oil yet the ingredients list says 100% sweet almond oil. It's just disappointing because I want to believe what I'm putting on my skin is genuine. It's hard to trust a company that can't make sure the packaging is correct. I saw that someone else had a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: S Leathers

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a number of oils and they were okay. This feels great. Using it for my skin. Want to make it last.
customer_reviews.author: n.e.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few weeks on my face & I have to say it is helping diminishing my lines.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Staying the same
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second purchase with this company and the first time was better. The first bottle came with a clasp/stopper as well as a different shading for the bottle. The second round I ordered two bottles and none of them have a stopper/clasp and the bottle is lighter. My household still loves the oil and use it however imagine to in person shift was very interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used coconut oil to moisturize and still do occasionally. This is my new go to. Added a little orange essential and now it smells heavenly. Just plain I detect no scent at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best solution I have found yet for irritated, dry skin. Won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Max Boss

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: just be careful as this oil stains fabric. I used to massage and had to throw the towel away!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! I used it fresh out of the shower and also after I wash my hands. My skin has not been dry sine I started using it! It’s a great quality and it’s hexane free! I had to contact the company and they were so gracious and appreciative of me as a customer! I will be buying much more from this company! Wonderful product, wonderful people!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a moisturizer on my face hands and feet. Absorbs fast. Non oily.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Loren Galdamez

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I use this during massages and it's perfect. You don't need much so it lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grapeseed oil?
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients 100% almond oil so where does the great seats come in?
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: Be careful I bought two bottles at two different occasions and the label on one bottle said it was grapeseed oil and and the actual ingredients listed was almond oil (no grapeseed oil at all) Weird. I was making gifts and could not give some of them out because of possible allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Sohnja Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great chemical free grapeseed oil for face and body!
customer_reviews.text: Great hexane free cold-pressed grapeseed oil that moisturizes my skin. Also, came with a pump that works better than most!
customer_reviews.author: Carolanne

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the soaks into my skin right away. Really lovely product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our new born had cradle cap and we used this for three days and it worked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I have 3c low porosity hair & this oil is perfect for my LCO!
customer_reviews.author: Ashkenia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I have tried a lot of different brands but this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for 30 years
customer_reviews.text: It does soak into the skin nicely and is probably great for preventing wrinkles if used everyday for years.
customer_reviews.author: betcy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wear it at night my skin is soft in the morning
customer_reviews.author: America

customer_reviews.title: Use it for many things
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many bottles of this grapeseed oil. I use it to take off my eye makeup, and I use it as a body moisturizer, and sometimes lip conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Almond Oil | NOT Grapeseed Oil
customer_reviews.text: Ordered "100% Pure Grapeseed Oil". Front cover, description, and directions all state grapeseed oil, but the ingredients section state "100% Pure and Natural Sweet Almond Oil".
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not actually Grapeseed oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice oil, easy to dispense and use. Little to no scent which is always a plus. Not the most moisturizing for all day use, and as you can see on the ingredients list instead of Grapeseed oil it's actually Sweet Almond oil. Overall it's a nice oil, just not what I was expecting to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No pump
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a pump. No pump came with it and there is no way to contact anyone about getting it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an oil cleanser before my regular cleanser. It works great! My skin looks and feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: awesome oil
customer_reviews.text: Grape seed oil is awesome! The two things I use this the most for are hair masks or in a sugar body scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Andrinna

customer_reviews.title: Love the consistency for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil for my hair.! I love the consistency and that it doesn’t weigh my fine hair down. It moisturizes without it looking oily. I use it on my skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

product_meta.title: Handcraft Pure Apricot Kernel Oil - 100% Pure And Natural - Premium Quality Cold Pressed Carrier Apricot Oil for Aromatherapy, Massage and Moisturizing Skin - HUGE 16 oz - Packaging May Vary
feature_bullets: 100% PURE & NATURAL APRICOT OIL unfiltered, undiluted without any additives or fillers. Rich in vitamins and fatty acids it is truly a wonder carrier oil. From skin care to aromatherapy and way beyond this amazing oil has endless uses.

NATURAL SKIN MOISTURIZER our Apricot Kernel Oil is easy to apply as it spreads on and penetrates deep into the skin. It soothes and nourishes the skin and once it is absorbed it provides moisturization throughout the day.

APRICOT OIL FOR HAIR loved by many people around the world for their hair care. When applied to the hair shafts, It helps to detangle hair. It promotes hair growth because of the nutrients in it, especially Vitamin E. It helps to achieve gorgeous shiny hair without any greasiness and it also softens the hair, so that they are more manageable and easily combed.

DILUTING ESSENTIAL OILS requires a carrier oil such as Apricot Oil , Coconut Oil , Sweet Almond Oil , Grapeseed Oil , etc.. Since essential oils are so potent, they must be diluted before being applied to the skin.
APRICOT KERNEL MASSAGE OIL this oil is one of the best carrier oils for massage. It penetrates nicely into the skin and also improves the delivery of essential oils and other herbal agents.
